original_title: 実写版 まいっちんぐマチコ先生 東大お受験大作戦!!
overview: Machiko Mai joined the private school Arama. She was late on the very first day but the principal Kokedaruma did not seem to care because Machiko was a Tokyo University graduate. He requested that Machiko to make the students smart enough to enter Tokyo University so that Arama can be a prestigious high school.
title: Maicching Machiko Teacher - Mission: Challenging Tokyo University
